title: The Evolving Future of User Acquisition with Mistplay's CCO Aaron Thandi

rawLines.text: Welcome to the Deconstructor of Fund
podcast. Today we're diving into the
world of loyaltydriven user acquisition
and retention with none other than Aaron
Tundi, chief commercial officer at
Mispl. Now, if you've been paying
attention to the mobile gaming space
over the past few years, you've probably
heard Misplay's name come out often as
the benchmark everyone is chasing. So,
in this episode, Aaron joins me to
unpack how Misplay became the OG of
reward and engagement, why developers
are increasingly turning to loyalty
platforms to acquire high value users,
and how Misplay's AI powered matchmaking
between players and games creates a
win-win scenario for players,
developers, and Misplay itself. We get
into why Misplay has taken deliberate
and methodical approach to global
expansion, what makes their user base so
sticky and valuable, and how company is
evolving its offering beyond just Google
Play. And yes, Aaron teases us some big
announcement for MAU Vegas this month.
So whether you're looking for high LTB
users, just curious how loyalty is
redefining growth on mobile, this
episode insights won't won't want to
miss. That's a lot. I think this was a
fun episode. I think it's a short. I
think it's insightful. I think Aaron is
a beast. So without further ado, ladies
and gentlemen, let's just get into it.
[Music]
Aaron Tandi, welcome to the podcast.

No. So I mean look, you can take it the
